functions.tag: {author:"A Knight of New Hoiro",title:"Epitaph of New Hoiro",resolved:1b,pages:["I don't know who you are, I don't know if I even believe you exist, but... Ghost of the Future, do you know who you are? Do you know what you do, and why? I never did... Now I stand here, at the end of my life, dying for a dead nation, one that probably never deserved to be saved,","and I wonder... Do I do this for them, or simply because I know no better? Ghost of the Future, I implore you, do better than I."]}
